name: PHAdjustmentData
desc: A description of the edits made to an asset's photo, video, or Live Photo content, which allows your app to reconstruct or revert the effects of prior editing sessions.

items.name: init(formatIdentifier: String, formatVersion: String, data: Data)
items.desc: Initializes an adjustment object with the specified format and data.

items.name: var formatIdentifier: String
items.desc: A string uniquely identifying the format of the adjustment data.

items.name: var formatVersion: String
items.desc: A version number for the adjustment data format.

items.name: var data: Data
items.desc: Data that contains the information necessary to reconstruct the adjustment.
